General.Name: Gulshan Polyols Limited
General.Description: Gulshan Polyols Limited engages in the mineral and grain processing, and ethanol distillery businesses in India and internationally. The company provides starch sugar products, such as sorbitol 70% solution, dextrose monohydrate, malto dextrine powder, and liquid glucose, as well as rice fructose syrups, brown rice syrups, and rice syrup solids; organic sweeteners; and activated, precipitated, and ground calcium carbonate products. It also offers grain based extra neutral alcohol, ethanol from damaged food grain, country liquor, and sanitizers, as well as alcoholic beverages under the Tiger Gold and Golden deer brands; and manufactures agro based animal feed products comprising corn/maize gluten feed, corn germ, cattle feed/enriched fiber, rice protein/gluten, and corn steep liquor products. In addition, the company provides native and maize starches in various grades. It serves pharmaceutical, personal care, footwear, tire, rubber and plastic, paint, alcohol, paper, agrochemical, and food and agro industries. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Delhi, India.
